                                  double xMeters,

        Compute a new Lat/Long point (without altitude) given specified changes along latitude and longitude.
        Parameters:

        xMeters - longitude change in meters
        yMeters - latitude change in meters
        Returns:
        new lat/long position.

      • dcmFromEuler

        public static double[][] dcmFromEuler(double roll,
                                      double pitch,
                                      double yaw)
        Create a rotation matrix given some euler angles this is based on http://gentlenav.googlecode.com/files/EulerAngles.pdf
        Parameters:
        roll - vehicle roll in degrees
        pitch - vehicle pitch in degrees
        yaw - vehicle yaw in degrees
        Returns:
        Rotation matrix

      • simplify

        public static java.util.List<LatLong> simplify(java.util.List<? extends LatLong> list,
                                               double epsilon)
        Based on the Ramer–Douglas–Peucker algorithm http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer%E2%80%93Douglas%E2%80%93Peucker_algorithm
        Parameters:
        list - List of lat/long points in the curve.
        epsilon - Tolerance for determining list of points for approximation of curve.
        Returns:
        List of lat/long points in the approximated curve.

      • pointToLineDistance

        public static double pointToLineDistance(LatLong L1,
                                         LatLong L2,
                                         LatLong P)
        Provides the distance from a point P to the line segment that passes through A-B. If the point is not on the side of the line, returns the distance to the closest point
        Parameters:
        L1 - First point of the line
        L2 - Second point of the line
        P - Point to measure the distance
        Returns:
        distance between point and line in meters.

      • getHeadingFromCoordinates

                                               LatLong toLoc)
        Computes the heading between two coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fromLoc - start lat/long position
        toLoc - end lat/long position
        Returns:
        heading in degrees

      • newCoordFromBearingAndDistance

        public static LatLong newCoordFromBearingAndDistance(LatLong origin,
                                                     double bearing,
                                                     double distance)
        Extrapolate latitude/longitude given a heading and distance thanks to http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong.html
        Parameters:
        origin - Point of origin
        bearing - bearing to navigate
        distance - distance to be added
        Returns:
        new point with the added distance

      • getPolylineLength

        public static double getPolylineLength(java.util.List<LatLong> gridPoints)
        Compute total length of the polyline in meters.
        Parameters:
        gridPoints - list of lat/long points for the polyline.
        Returns:
        length of the polyline in meters.
